description.lang: Aeon Labs Dry Contact Sensor Gen5 is a dry conatct sensor that can detect a variety of dry contact signals, you just need to connect the matched external sensor on it, such as the water level sensor, dry contact switch, dry contact relay and so on. In other words, it can be used if the external sensor is a dry contact. Its a security Z-Wave device that supports security encryption. Also it supports the Over the Air Firmware Updating that allows you wirelessly update its firmware if needs. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from manufacturers and/or other applications.
Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has max 5 nodes to associate.The Basic Set CC or Sensor Binary report CC will be sent to the associated nodes in Group 1.

name.lang: Which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On or Off.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the Sensor binary report value when the Sensor is triggered On or Off.
When the Sensor is triggered On, Sensor Binary Report=0xFF. When the Sensor is triggered Off, Sensor Binary Report=0x00.
When the Sensor is triggered On, Sensor Binary Report=0x00. When the Sensor is triggered Off, Sensor Binary Report=0xFF.

name.lang: Set the interval time of battery report.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the interval time of battery report.
The periodic battery report is disabled.
the range of interval time is 1 seconds to 2147483647 seconds.

name.lang: To set which command will be sent to the associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set which command will be sent to the associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Send Sensor Binary Report to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Send Basic Set to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Send the Sensor Binary Report and Basic Set to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

name.lang: Set a Notification type for Dry Contact Sensor.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set a Notification type for Dry Contact Sensor.
The Smoke Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The CO Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The CO2 Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Heat Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Water Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Access Control notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Home Security notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Power Management notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The System notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Emergency Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Clock notification type is selected for the Sensor.

name.lang: Enable/disable wake-up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable wake-up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.
Disable.
Enable.
This parameter is used to reset the Sensor.
Reset to factory default settings.
Reset to factory default settings and removed from the Z-Wave network.

name.lang: Which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the Basic Set value when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
When the Sensor is triggered On, Basic Set=0x00. When the Sensor is triggered Off, Basic Set=0xFF.
When the Sensor is triggered On, Basic Set=0xFF. When the Sensor is triggered Off, Basic Set=0x00.
This parameter is used to set the low battery value.
The range of low battery value is 10% to 50%
